nodes.text: R4-B0018 was an R4-series agromech droid that was employed as a serving droid on Cloud City. The droid was colored in white, yellow and orange, and included a Burtt acoustic signaller. It was also equipped with a head mounted serving pincer that could serve refreshments to patrons.

This Halloween-themed droid was a toy made available exclusively from Disney Parks in 2018. It's coloring was inspired by candy corn, and the droid included a piece of the candy to hold in its pincer. A similarly-named Halloween-themed droids, R2-B00 and R3-B0017 were released in previous years.
